passive.description: Using a weapon skill increases Damage Resistance by 30% and Control Resistance by 35 for 6s.

basicAttacks.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Swing] every 4s. Deals [Damage Rate: 240%] Physical Damage to all players ([Damage Rate: 480%] Physical Damage to mobs) in a frontal cone.

[Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Smash] every 7s. Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and restores [Healing Rate: 90%] HP to up to 5 nearby allies. Increases Damage Resistance by 15% for 6s.

[Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Crushing Smash] every 6s. Charges toward target, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and inflicting Slow 35% for 3s.

commonSkills.description: Smashes the ground 4 times. The first three hits deal [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage to mobs). The final hit deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to mobs) and Knocks Up for 0.5s.
Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicting Immobilize for 2.5s to enemies in the area.

Creates a Guardian Field at the target location that increases allies' Max HP by 25% and grants Immunity to Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback) and Hard Control (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify, Sleep). Lasts 5s.

Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to enemies in range and creates a Field of Silence, lasting 4s. Enemies in the field are Slowed by 25% and Silenced. Once they leave the area, they become immune to the field's Silence for 6s.

Applies [Vengeful Thunder] to the caster or an allied target. [Vengeful Thunder]: Increases Damage Resistance by 25% for 8s. When taking damage or dealing Basic Attack Damage, calls down lightning at the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 51%] Physical Damage. (
Cooldown: 0.8s)

skills.description: Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to all players ([Damage Rate: 375%] Physical Damage to mobs) in range. Grants  [Target-based Max HP 6%] Shield for each enemy hit, lasting 6s. Stacks up to 5 times.

Hold to charge up to 3s. Damage area grows with charge time, reaching max size at 2s. Cannot be interrupted while charging. Deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to enemies in range every 0.5s during charge. When released at max charge, Pulls enemies to the caster, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage and applies Slow 40% for 3s. At lower Charge stacks, only deals damage and slows.
Slams the ground to deal [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies, dispel all buffs, reduce their damage dealt by 50% for 8s, and inflict Silence for 3s. Max targets affected: 15.
Launches a mechanical hook forward. The first enemy hit is Stunned (ignores Control Resistance) for 1.5s, takes [Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage, and is Pulled to the caster.

Raises shield for 20s, gaining control immunity, +50% Damage Resistance, and an increased hit area. Can reactivate to deal [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage and inflict 50% Slow for 3s. Shield breaks after taking  [Target-based Max HP 30%] damage, ending this enhanced state.

Fires two heavy rounds that create a gravity vortex where they meet. Enemies in the vortex are Slowed by 25%. Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies in the vortex after 1.5s, pulling them to the center and Stunning for 1s.

Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicting 1.5s Knockup on enemies. Creates a thunderstorm field that lasts 6s. Enemies within 7m have their Damage Resistance reduced by 15% and take [Damage Rate: 70%] Physical Damage every second.

Grants Paladin Force, cleansing all DoT and slow effects, and grating immunity to DoT and debuffs for 20s, along with the [Divine Zeal] and [Guardian Shield] Skills.
 [Zeal: Strike 1]: Rush forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage.
[Zeal: Strike 2]: Deals [Damage Rate: 140%] Magic Damage to enemies in range and slows them for 40% for 2s.
 [Zeal: Strike 3]: Deals [Damage Rate: 160%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies, heal allies around you for [Healing Rate: 72%] HP, increases their Damage Resistance by 20% , Control Resistance by 2000%, for 4s.

--[Guardian Shield]--
Channels for 4s, during which the caster is Unstoppable, increasing Damage Resistance of allies in range by 45% and restoring [Healing Rate: 90%] HP per second. After channeling ends, deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to surrounding enemies and Stuns them for 2s. Each time damage is taken during channeling, the final damage increases by 10% up to a maxium of 50%.
Clicking the skill again cancels the channeling early.
